subHeading: New York City Labor & Employment Lawyers for Working People
valueProp:
Cary Kane PLLC is a prominent labor and employment law firm based in New York City. The firm is dedicated to representing employees, labor unions, and employee benefit plans in a wide range of legal matters. With a focus on protecting the rights of workers and ensuring fair treatment in the workplace, the attorneys at Cary Kane PLLC have a strong track record of advocating for their clients.

The firm handles cases related to employment discrimination, sexual harassment, wage and hour violations, wrongful termination, and more. Additionally, Cary Kane PLLC provides legal counsel to labor unions and employee benefit plans, offering comprehensive support in labor-management relations, benefit fund administration, and fiduciary duty matters. The firm's commitment to upholding labor and employment laws and advocating for the rights of workers has established it as a trusted legal resource in the New York City area.
